author: Jessica

Definitely trying these. 3. Like everyone else, I want to start a substack! Shocking. 4. Whatever you’re looking for, you will find […]
text: 1. Yesterday I cooked with so much garlic that my house STILL smells like it. And that was with using all my little remedies of eliminating kitchen odors. 2. Eggless chocolate chip cookies!! Definitely trying these. 3. Like everyone else, I want to start a substack! Shocking. 4. Whatever you’re looking for, you will find it. 5. TV things!! We are watching the new season of 1923 and love it. 6. What to do when you can’t stop procrastinating. 7. The Oscars looks! Oh my gosh. I just about died over the Cynthia/Ariana looks for their performance. Incredible. And Ariana’s red carpet dress! And Demi Moore, Halle Berry, Selena Gomez… ah! All so good. 8. The rise and fall of honeycrisp apples. Ugh! My favorite apple of all time.
html:
1. Yesterday I cooked with so much garlic that my house STILL smells like it. And that was with using all my little remedies of eliminating kitchen odors.

2. Eggless chocolate chip cookies!! Definitely trying these.

3. Like everyone else, I want to start a substack! Shocking.

4. Whatever you’re looking for, you will find it.

5. TV things!! We are watching the new season of 1923 and love it.

6. What to do when you can’t stop procrastinating.

7. The Oscars looks! Oh my gosh. I just about died over the Cynthia/Ariana looks for their performance. Incredible. And Ariana’s red carpet dress! And Demi Moore, Halle Berry, Selena Gomez… ah! All so good.

8. The rise and fall of honeycrisp apples. Ugh! My favorite apple of all time.
